title: EmpaniZambos (Chicken Nuggets) Using Zambos Chile Limón
ingredients: 2 cups of crushed Zambos Chile Limón
instructions: Step 1: Cut the chicken breasts widthwise into strips
Step 2: Pass the strips through BBQ sauce until well covered
Step 3: Crush the Zambos Chile Limón as finely as possible
Step 4: Cover the chicken pieces with the crushed Zambos
Step 5: Heat the oil and fry each piece until golden
Step 6: Serve with BBQ sauce to taste or drizzle with additional sauce
